project.name: moviepilot.com
project.description: moviepilot.com is a new home for upcoming movies – and a home for movie fans around the globe who care about them. Discuss news, trailers and facts long before a movie hits theaters.
project.what_we_did: Together with our friends at 9elements we helped develop an interaction concept as well as the first couple of iterations for the new moviepilot.com. Thanks to the mad Backbone.js skills of Mathias Schäfer, people now can enjoy a whole new and highly interactive moviepilot.com - and developers are invited to use Chaplin, a sample application architecture Mathias et al. built on top of Backbone.js.
